TypeSignature.Value: public class RandomAccessFile : Java.Lang.Object, IDisposable, Java.IO.ICloseable, Java.IO.IDataInput, Java.IO.IDataOutput

type RandomAccessFile = class inherit Object interface ICloseable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IDataInput interface IDataOutput

Docs.summary: Allows reading from and writing to a file in a random-access manner.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Writes a boolean to this file as a single byte (1 for true, 0 for false), starting at the current file pointer.

Docs.exception: if this file is closed or another I/O error occurs.

if the encoded string is longer than 65535 bytes.
